product_name: Nykaa Naturals Skin Secrets Exotic Indulgence Sheet Mask

product_name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution

product_name: Pilgrim 25% AHA 2% BHA 5% PHA Face Peeling Solution

product_name: Dot & Key Anti-Acne Salicylic Green Clay Face Mask
description: A detoxifying clay mask infused with salicylic acid to combat acne and unclog pores. Its soothing formula helps reduce redness and prevents breakouts, giving you clear, healthy skin.
